common.model

Class AbstractSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.model.AbstractType
      • common.model.AbstractSquare
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICopy, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractContainer, EmptySquare

    public abstract class AbstractSquare
extends AbstractType
implements ICopy, java.io.Serializable
    AbstractSquare defines any object which can be placed on a board.
    Author:
    Nicholas Panzarino, jasirocki - jdoc
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static java.lang.String type()
        Static Method that Determines the String value of this type of Square. This will be displayed in ComboBoxes. All subclasses should overwrite/hide this method.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        If any square must initialize to a specific state, it should overwrite this function. This will be the last thing board calls before starting a game.
